knimeNode.name: URI To String
knimeNode.shortDescription: Convert an URI column into a string column.

fullDescription.intro: This node converts the selected URI column into a column of the type string.
fullDescription.option: Does append the string column to the table instead of replacing the selected column.

ports.inPort: Table that contains an URI column.
ports.outPort: Input table with the corresponding string column to the selected column. It will either be appended or replacing the old column, depending on the configuration.
